channel.title: [317 Pi] How to light the magic icons up? [317 Pi]
channel.description:
Hello peeps :)
i want to add magic icons that are lighting up, Like The V of varrock is lighting up. searched every forums,google etc. Base: Project insanity. revision: 317 pi
Btw i dont know if its client or server sided so sorry if its posted wrong...
Peace and Thx for help

item.title: [317 Pi] How to light the magic icons up? [317 Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Pkor159:

This is probably client/cache sided. Go find Tom’s cache suite and edit cache. (If you want more or less icons to light up).

No, you send the configs over (via server) if the requirements are right and the client will read the configs and light the appropriate icons.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 Pi] How to light the magic icons up? [317 Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Naseem, post:2, topic:528532”]Can you explain more about what/where exactly do you want to add?

If i’m right, You want to add another teleport buttons to your modern/ancient spell book?[/quote]

No he wants it so that when you have a high enough magic level and enough runes to cast the spell, for the spell icon to light up.

Read full topic
